name: Salo 3D
description:
Salo 3D is a mind-bending 3D Puzzle game where saving and loading are core mechanics you have to utilize to solve the puzzles! Now with sound and a tutorial!

The game was made for the "Stop Waiting For Godot" jam.

IF YOU'RE STUCK THE SOLUTIONS ARE IN THE COMMUNITY FORUMS.

The game window cannot be resized, this is intentional. Save files persist between game instances

GOOD LUCK!

Logo/favicon emoji designed by OpenMoji – the open-source emoji and icon project. License: CC BY-SA 4.0

Sounds from OpenGameArt.

Font from Google Fonts.
